title: Calendar-Mcp-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Google Calendar integration in Claude Desktop, enabling AI assistants to manage Google Calendar events through natural language interactions.
creator: GongRzhe

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID obtained from the Google Cloud Console.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client Secret obtained from the Google Cloud Console.

GOOGLE_REFRESH_TOKEN.description: OAuth 2.0 Refresh Token obtained from the Google OAuth Playground for accessing the Calendar API.
